title: Crowdfunded eSports Team?
body: Is a crowdfunded LCS team legal under the current LCS rules?

replies.body:
I'm not too sure on this one. I recommend reaching out on the [eSports boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports). I'm sure there will be lots of folks in the community who may know better than me. ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions.
